name: snyk open source
description: Snyk open source is a tool used to scan dependencies in a project

name: pip-audit
description: Scanner for vulnerable dependencies in Python-prosjects. Also supports automatic patching.

name: npm audit
description: Scanner for vulnerable dependencies in Node-prosjects. Also supports automatic patching.

name: Dependabot
description: Monitors dependencies for vulnerabilities.  Also supports automatic patching.

name: snyk code
description: Snyk code is a SAST (Static Application Testing) tool for source code.

name: CodeQL
description: Identifies vulnerabilities and errors in source code

name: Secret scanning
description: Scans for passwords, keys and other secrets to avoid exposing them in repositories.

name: bandit
description: Detect common security issues in Python

name: semgrep
description: SAST-tool with a custom rule set based on YAML

name: burp
description: A platform containing multiple tools for dynamic web application security testing.

name: ZAP
description: A platform containing multiple tools for dynamic web application security testing.

name: nuclei
description: A tool used for dynamic application security testing (DAST).

name: XSStrike
description: Scanner for XSS (Cross-site scripting) vulnerabilities in web applications
